mdRecord.dcterms:creator: GÃ©rard de Rayneval, J.-M., 1736-1812
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Heard from M. DuPont that Jefferson received his letter; after favorable receipt, sends another letter by M. Pichon, who is entrusted by the government to take up the matter with Congress; trusts that Jefferson will give the affair due consideration.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1801 January 1, St. Germain, [France] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
